title: Andhra Pradesh Government Announces New Skill Development Policy for Youth
description: The Andhra Pradesh government on Monday announced a new Skill Development Policy aimed at improving employability among youth. The policy focuses on digital skills, industry partnerships, and rural employment opportunities. Officials stated that the initiative will be implemented in phases starting from the next financial year.
